docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Macro Maker Coding Project My final project for Java Data Structures (H) will allow the user to log and record all inputs and their timings that are sent into a computer: key presses, mouse clicks, mouse movements, scrolling, etc. The actions can then be stored and replayed at a later date. Planning Documentation Use
docs.title: Macro Project

docs.text: My final project for Java Data Structures (H) will allow the user to log and record all inputs and their timings that are sent into a computer: key presses, mouse clicks, mouse movements, scrolling, etc. The actions can then be stored and replayed at a later date.
